title: Create Tenant in Audit API fails
content:
During tenant creation in Suite Administration, the tenant gets created in the Suite Administration, but not in the Audit service. You may see this message under the Operation history tab in Suite Administration:

Fail to call Audit Api:Error occurred

Cause

This failure occurs because the Create Tenant in Audit API, which helps to create a tenant in the Audit service, has failed.

Solution

Create the tenant manually by running the Create Tenant in Audit API.

Related topic

To know more about Create Tenant in Audit API, see Audit tenant lifecycle APIs.
